A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was absolutely a flop. So disorganized with three different plots going on. The garbage\, throw-away answer of who Rey's parents are is a middle finger to fans who spent so much time contemplating who she is. Based on the answer given\, she shouldn't have any jedi powers at all. Why is she so strong? Rian Johnson should not be able to have creative control over any more of these movies. He ruined this movie.
